name: markdown-kanban-obsidian
description: Kanban board for Markdown files, compatible with obsidian kanban boards

markdown-kanban.enableBackups.description: Enable automatic backups of kanban files

markdown-kanban.backupInterval.description: Interval in minutes between automatic backups (1-60 minutes)

enumDescriptions: Store backups in the same folder as the original file
Store backups in a .backups folder in the workspace root
Store backups in a custom location (set customBackupPath)

markdown-kanban.maxBackupsPerFile.description: Maximum number of backups to keep per file (older backups will be deleted)

markdown-kanban.openLinksInNewTab.description: Open file links in new tabs instead of replacing the current editor

markdown-kanban.pathGeneration.description: How to generate file paths when creating links from drag & drop, clipboard, and link replacement
enumDescriptions: Generate relative paths from the current document

markdown-kanban.whitespace.description: The amount of whitespace/padding to use in the Kanban board (e.g., '4px', '8px', '2px')
markdown-kanban.whitespace.patternErrorMessage: Please enter a valid CSS size value (e.g., '4px', '0.5em', '1rem')

markdown-kanban.maxRowHeight.description: Maximum height for kanban rows in pixels. Set to 0 for unlimited height (full card height). Other values limit the row height.

markdown-kanban.showRowTags.description: Show row tags (#row2, #row3, #row4) in column headers

markdown-kanban.tagColors.description: Grouped color and style configuration for tags in kanban boards with various visual indicators.

markdown-kanban.taskMinHeight.description: The minimum height for task cards (e.g., 'auto', '200px', '400px', '43.5vh', '89vh')
enumDescriptions: Minimum height of 43.5% of viewport height
Minimum height of 89% of viewport height

markdown-kanban.fontSize.description: The font size for task cards and content

markdown-kanban.fontFamily.description: The font family for task cards and content

markdown-kanban.layoutPresets.description: Custom layout presets configuration. Each preset should contain a 'label', 'description', and 'settings' object with layout options.

description.description: Description of what this preset does

markdown-kanban.layoutRows.description: The number of rows in the kanban layout

markdown-kanban.stickyHeaders.description: Control sticky positioning of column headers
enumDescriptions: Column headers stick to top when scrolling
Column headers scroll normally with content

markdown-kanban.tagVisibility.description: Control which types of tags are displayed on cards
enumDescriptions: Show all tags including #span, #row, and @ tags
Show only custom tags (not configured ones) and @ tags

markdown-kanban.imageFill.description: Control how images are sized within cards
enumDescriptions: Images size to their natural dimensions
Images fill available space while keeping aspect ratio

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
scripts.analyze-all: npm run analyze-code && npm run analyze-cleanup
